casebody.data:
TRUSTEE OF LOAN OFFICE v. JOSEPH WARD. Court of Common Pleas. New Castle. May, 1795. Rodney’s Notes. Johns [for plaintiff]. G. Read [for defendant]. Johns, for plaintiff,

reads bond etc. to Land Office. Verdict for plaintiff subject to the opinion of the Court.

G. Read, for defendant.

2 Cromp. 100, 4 Bac.Abr. 422, Salk. 52. Salk. 401, all things done in vacation has relation to the preceding term.

The Court granted leave to the plaintiff to amend the writ so as to relate to the term preceding the entry of judgment.
